caption.p: EECP suppressed migration, invasion, and colony formation in MDA-MB-231 cells stimulated with LPS. (a) EECP suppressed migration, invasion, and colony formation in MDA-MB-231 cells. (b)–(d) Quantification of cell migration, invasion, and colony formation in MDA-MB-231 cells after EECP treatment. (e) EECP inhibited angiogenesis in human umbilical vein endothelial cells (HUVECs) at 6 h. (f, g) Quantification of tubes and branches of angiogenesis. Values represent the mean ± SEM from three independent experiments ( ∗ P < 0.05, ∗∗ P < 0.01 vs. control, n = 3).
